title: 20 Best Bollywood Songs of 2015 (gnv64)
description:
20 Best Bollywood Songs of 2015

1. Sooraj Dooba Hai Yaaron â€“ Roy
This party track is composed by Amaal Mallik and sung by Arijit Singh and Aditi Singh Sharma. Ranked number in most list of Best Bollywood Songs of 2015

2. Jeena Jeena â€“ Badlapur
â€˜Jeena Jeenaâ€™ from the film â€˜Badlapurâ€™ is sung by Atif Aslam and composed by Sachin-Jigar.

3. Khaamoshiyan â€“ Khamoshiyaan
One of the best romantic track of 2015. It is sung by Arijit Singh & composed by Jeet Gannguli.

4. Tu Hai Ki Nahi â€“ Roy
Another popular and famous track from Roy which is sung by Ankit Tiwari.

5. Tu Jo Hain â€“ Mr. X
Ankit Tiwarâ€™s composition and voice in this beautiful Romantic Song from Emran Hashmiâ€™s next movie Mr. X.

6. Main Hoon Hero Tera â€“ Hero
Salman Khanâ€™s Hero Title Song is one of the most popular Bollywood Song of 2015. Surprising but true.

7. Deewani Mastani â€“ Bajirao Mastani
Featuring Ranveer Singh, Deepika Padukone & Priyanka Chopra, the song is sung by Mujtaba Aziz Naza, Shahdab Faridi, Altmash Faridi and Farhan Sabri.

8. Jee Karda â€“ Badlapur
One of the biggest hit of 2015. â€˜Jee Kardaâ€™ from â€˜Badlapurâ€™ starring Varun Dhawan is sung by Divya Kumar.

9. Prem Ratan Dhan Payo - Title song
Music has been composed by Himesh Reshammiya and the song is sung by Palak Muchhal. The lyrics for this song starring Salman Khan and Sonam Kapoor are penned by Irshad Kamil.

10. Superman â€“ Tevar
First big hit song of 2015 composed by Sajid-Wajid and sung by Wajid. This song is still one of the Best Bollywood Songs of 2015.

11. Chittiyaan Kalaiyaan â€“ Roy
Meet Bros Anjjanâ€™s Punjabi track â€˜Chittiyaan Kalaiyaanâ€™ from the movie â€˜Royâ€™. This dance song is sung by Kanika Kapoor and can be heard in all parties and functions.

12. Desi Look â€“ Ek Paheli Leela
Another Sizzling Hot number featuring Sunny Leone and Sung by Kanika Kapoor. One of the Best Bollywood Songs of 2015 till now.

13. Hamari Adhuri Kahani â€“ Title Song
Another super hit from Arijit singh which is doing extraordinary on chart buster. This is among best Bollywood Songs of 2015.

14. Banno Tera Swagger â€“ Tanu Weds Manu Returns
Bannoâ€™ from â€˜Tanu Weds Manuâ€™ is sung in the voice of Brijesh Shandllya and Swati Sharma, the music is composed by Tanishk and Vayu.

15. Afghan Jalebi â€“ Phantom
Pakistani Singer Asrar sang this song beautifully which was composed by Pritam. Both version of this song is quite enjoyable.

16. Sapna Jahan â€“ Brothers
This melodious romantic track by Sonu Nigam and Neeti Mohan is one of the best ever track you will listen this year..

17. Bezuban Fir Se â€“ ABCD 2
Slow and catchy dance number from ABCD starring Varun Dhawan and Shraddha Kapoor. This Song is composed by Duo of Sachin Jigar.

18. Tung Tung Baje â€“ Singh is Bling
Lovely Song sung by Gulraj Singh. A Love song featuring Kangana and Emran Hashmi.

19. Tere Bin Nahi Laage â€“ Ek Paheli Leela
Uzair Jaswal composed the original music, and has been recreated, arranged and produced by Amaal Mallik.

20. Tu Har Lamha â€“ Khamoshiyaan
Romantic song â€˜Tu Har Lamhaâ€™ from â€˜Khamoshiyanâ€™. This romantic track is sung by Arijit Singh
